title: Hoops Tonight - Steph & Warriors blow out Grizzlies, Giannis & Bucks dominate Celtics
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Steph & Warriors blow out Grizzlies, Giannis & Bucks dominate Celtics
description:
Jason reacts to Steph Curry, Draymond Green, Klay Thompson and the Warriors’ blow out Game 3 win over Ja Morant and the Grizzlies. He also discusses Giannis Antetokounmpo’s dominant performance as the Bucks held of a late comeback from Jayson Tatum and the Celtics to take a 2-1 series lead. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
